policy.policy: GITC values your support and guarantees your privacy. This statement addresses both information provided by visitors to the Site and how GITC handles that information. GITC takes all possible measures to protect the privacy of our online visitors. GITC does not require website visitors to register or provide personal information to view the Website, as GITC does not collect personal information about its visitors unless they voluntarily and knowingly provide such information. GITC assures you that its website maintains the confidential identity of all those who have contacted GITC through this website. If you have any questions about this Site's privacy policy, please contact us.
